entry.title: Fresh UI for Chromium is here.

Sending is easy too, directly from your addressÂ book!Putting users first with Stellar WalletÂ Kit.did you know that adding Hana Wallet support makes life easier for all users. The easiest way? Use Stellar Wallet Kit. It automatically enables Hana Wallet, alongside other major StellarÂ wallets.The library kit ships with a built UI modal so you donâ€™t even need to handle that if you donâ€™t want to, just define what wallets you want to support in your app and let the library handle everything else.Try It OutÂ TodayUpdate your Hana Wallet mobile app and start managing your Stellar NFTs effortlessly.If youâ€™re a developer, consider integrating Stellar Wallet Kit to make Hana Wallet a seamless option for yourÂ users.Got questions? entry.title: Mirai Season Hits Halfway.
entry.content: Weâ€™re halfway through Mirai Season, and the excitement is growing! Over the past four weeks, weâ€™ve seen a surge in new users, intense leaderboard competition, and strong participation in our rewards system. With three weeks left, thereâ€™s still time to climb the ranks and win big!â€Šâ€”â€ŠPart of the prize pool is being rewarded in valuable Prime MachinÂ NFTâ€™s!A Thriving CommunityMirai Season has already welcomed over 1,000 new wallets to the seamless DeFi served up by Hana Wallet. Including, of course, cross-chain loans and swaps offered in partnership with Balanced DeFi, boosting Total Value Locked (TVL) in SUI andÂ mSUI.Some major milestones soÂ far:ğŸš€ $280K+ in average TVL for SUI and mSUI collateral.ğŸš€ Peak TVL ofÂ $320K!ğŸš€ Three winners have already claimed a Prime Machin in the Registration Raffle.ğŸš€ Two more Prime Machin are unlocked for the end-of-season lottery, with more on theÂ way!Community-Driven UpdatesBased on feedback, weâ€™re making key improvements to rewards and Hana RewardsÂ itself:âœ… New Leaderboard Pageâ€Šâ€”â€ŠEasily track rankings andÂ rewards.âœ… No More Average TVL Requirementâ€Šâ€”â€ŠFairer access to Prime MachinÂ rewards.âœ… 2 PM at $350K TVLâ€Šâ€”â€ŠTwo Prime Machin will now be unlocked if we hit this milestone!Keep the feedback coming so we can make sure you have the best time exploring DeFi with Hana Rewards! No problem!â€Šâ€”â€ŠEarn KOTO and BALN rewards just for participating.ğŸŸ End-of-Season Lotteryâ€Šâ€”â€ŠGet tickets by providing collateral or hitting XP milestones for a chance to win a valuable Prime Machin NFT (currently trading for overÂ $1000).The final stretch is hereâ€Šâ€”â€Šletâ€™s finish strong!Â ğŸš€Mirai Season Hits Halfway. was originally published in Hana World on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

entry.title: Hello Hana Card.
entry.content: Your multi-chain crypto just got easier to spend. Weâ€™re excited to introduce the Hana Card, a multi-chain virtual debit card that lets you top up directly from your non-custodial Hana Wallet and spend crypto anywhere Mastercard is accepted.Whether youâ€™re grabbing a coffee, shopping online, or dining out, the Hana Card seamlessly integrates with Apple Pay and Google Pay, making everyday crypto payments smooth and effortless.Why Youâ€™ll Love the HanaÂ CardNon-Custodial & Secureâ€Šâ€”â€ŠStay in full control of your assets. No third-party custody, no middlemen.Multi-Chain Supportâ€Šâ€”â€ŠTop up with $ETH, $AVAX, $XLM, and moreâ€Šâ€”â€Šdirectly from HanaÂ Wallet.Spend Anywhereâ€Šâ€”â€ŠUse your crypto at millions of merchants worldwide, backed by Mastercardâ€™s trustedÂ network.Instant & Seamlessâ€Šâ€”â€ŠPair with Apple Pay or Google Pay and tap to pay in stores, online, orÂ in-app.Launching First in Australia ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºâ€Šâ€”â€ŠPowered byÂ ImmersveThe Hana Card will initially be available to Hana Wallet users in Australia, in partnership with Immersveâ€Šâ€”â€Ša principal member of Mastercard.Immersveâ€™s technology enables both centralized and decentralized payment experiences, allowing users to spend their digital assets anywhere Mastercard is acceptedâ€Šâ€”â€Šonline, in-store, or even in the metaverse. With this partnership, Hana Wallet users in Australia will be among the first to experience seamless, real-world crypto payments.Global Pre-Registration is NowÂ OpenEven if youâ€™re not in Australia, you can still sign up for the waitlist today. Pre-register now to be notified as we expand to more countries and add support for even moreÂ assets.ğŸ’Œ Sign up now: https://www.hanawallet.io/cardThis is just the beginningâ€Šâ€”â€Šstay tuned for moreÂ updates!Have questions?Visit our Support Center to learnÂ more.Take your multi-chain crypto beyond the walletâ€Šâ€”â€Šget ready to spend it anywhere withÂ Hana.Hello Hana Card. was originally published in Hana World on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

entry.title: Hello Hana Rewards: Mirai Season.
entry.content: The countdown has begunâ€Šâ€”â€ŠHana Rewards officially launches on February 10, 2025, and weâ€™re kicking things off with Mirai Season, an exclusive six-week campaign in collaboration with Studio Mirai and Balanced!What is MiraiÂ Season?From February 10â€Šâ€”â€ŠMarch 24, 2025, the Hana Rewards platform will host Mirai Season, an XP-driven campaign where you canÂ explore:Swapping assets across multiple networksâ€Šâ€”â€ŠExperience seamless cross-chain transactions.Borrowing Against $SUI & $mSUIâ€Šâ€”â€ŠAccess liquidity with just 2% interest.Earning yield on bnUSDâ€Šâ€”â€ŠBalanced bnUSD rewards sit a ~14% APR at time ofÂ writing.ğŸ“¢ Want a head start? From February 1â€“9, take advantage of the Grace Period to set up your Hana Wallet, get hands-on with Balanced, and prepare forÂ launch.Whatâ€™s in It forÂ You?Exclusive Nozomi University x Marsh Hoodiesâ€Šâ€”â€ŠThe Top 50 leaderboard participants win limited-edition merch.KOTO & BALN Rewardsâ€Šâ€”â€ŠEveryone beyond the Top 50 will still earn $KOTO and $BALN based on their leaderboard ranking.Milestone Madnessâ€Šâ€”â€ŠEvery two weeks, TVL-based milestones will be shared, unlocking mystery prizes to be distributed through end-of-season lotteries. More XP = More lottery tickets = BiggerÂ rewards!How to Get Ready BeforeÂ Launchâœ… Register your Hana Wallet in the â¬› | hana channel on Studio Miraiâ€™s Discord.âœ… Follow @_StudioMirai, @hanawallet, and @BalancedDeFi on X.âœ… Explore Balanced and prepare forÂ launch.Mark Your Calendarâ€Šâ€”â€ŠHana Rewards Goes Live on FebruaryÂ 10!The first season of Hana Rewards is almost hereâ€Šâ€”â€Šmake sure youâ€™re ready to earn XP, climb the leaderboard, and claim yourÂ rewards!Hello Hana Rewards: Mirai Season. was originally published in Hana World on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

entry.title: Secure your Bitcoin with Ledger.
entry.content: Hana Wallet now supports Ledger integration for Bitcoin on both desktop and mobile devices! With this update, managing and securing your BTC has become safer and more convenient.Whatâ€™s new?Ledger support for Bitcoin: Connect your Ledger hardware wallet to Hana and manage your BTC securely.Available across devices: Desktop users can upgrade to version 3.6.0, and mobile users can update to version 1.31.0 to start using Ledger with BitcoinÂ today.Why use a cold wallet likeÂ Ledger?Cold wallets, such as Ledger devices, are designed to provide the highest level of security for your digital assets. By storing your private keys offline, they protect your funds from online threats like hacking and phishing attempts. Integrating Ledger with Hana Wallet ensures your BTC remains safe while giving you full control over your transactions.Ready to enhance your security?Update your Hana Wallet today and connect your Ledger to manage Bitcoin with peace ofÂ mind.Have questions or need assistance? Visit our Support Center to chat with us on the web orÂ in-app.Secure your Bitcoin with Ledger. was originally published in Hana World on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

entry.title: Hanaâ€™s 12 Days of Christmas
entry.content: Hana Wallet is bringing you a festive treat this holiday season with the 12 Days of Christmas Campaign!| â€œThe true Twelve Days are 25 December to 5 January, counting first andÂ last.â€From December 25th to January 5th, weâ€™re spreading the holiday cheer by giving our new and old community members a chance to win exclusive token airdrops every single dayÂ ğŸSign up forÂ freeClick here to play along: https://subscribe.hanawallet.io/12daysğŸ’œ This is our way of saying thank you to our incredible community and making the season even more exciting.Each day, participants will receive an email with a redeem code or redeem link. Simply follow the instructions to enter the campaign, and lucky users will unlock token rewards directly in their Hana Wallet. Not a winner today? No problemâ€Šâ€”â€Šcheck your inbox the next day for another chance toÂ win!How ItÂ WorksHereâ€™s what you can expect during the 12 Days of Christmas:Daily Emails:Starting December 25th, all confirmed subscribers will receive one email per day for 12Â days.Each email contains a unique redeem code or redeem link for that dayâ€™s airdrop opportunity.Redeem Your Code orÂ Link:Use the link or code inside the Hana Wallet app to see if youâ€™veÂ won.If youâ€™re lucky, youâ€™ll instantly receive the token airdrop in yourÂ wallet!Missed aÂ Day?Donâ€™t worryâ€Šâ€”â€Šcodes do not instantly expire. Youâ€™ll be able to check and claim all your received codes up to four weeks after the campaignÂ ends.No Strings Attached:Participating is completely freeâ€Šâ€”â€Šjust sign up for our campaign emails, follow the instructions, and enjoy theÂ fun.Need Help?If you have questions about the campaign or need help getting started, visit our Support Center for more resources, or contact our supportÂ team.Sign up for Hanaâ€™s 12 Days of Christmas right here: https://subscribe.hanawallet.io/12daysHanaâ€™s 12 Days of Christmas was originally published in Hana World on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

entry.title: Bitcoin is here.
entry.content: Manage Bitcoin (BTC) in your HanaÂ WalletWeâ€™re thrilled to announce a classic for Hana Wallet: Bitcoin is now supported on desktop! With this update, managing native BTC has entered the Hana ecosystem.Whatâ€™s new with BitcoinÂ support?Real on-chain BTC management: Send and receive BTC directly on the Bitcoin blockchainâ€Šâ€”â€Šall within the Hana Wallet interface.Connected chains made simple: Easily view and enable Bitcoin alongside other supported chains.Transaction fee control: If a Bitcoin transaction gets stuck due to low fees, Hana now lets you top up the transaction fee and get it movingÂ again.This update brings the Bitcoin blockchain right to your fingertips, combining Hanaâ€™s user-friendly design with the power of decentralized digitalÂ gold.Available on desktop today, coming soon toÂ mobileDesktop users can upgrade to the latest version of Hana Wallet (v3.5.0) to enjoy Bitcoin integration starting today. Mobile users, donâ€™t worryâ€Šâ€”â€Šthis feature will roll out to your devicesÂ soon!Additionally, weâ€™re excited to announce that Ledger support is coming soon, enhancing your options for more secure asset management.Ready to try itÂ out?Update your Hana Wallet on desktop today and start managing your Bitcoin effortlessly.Have questions, issues, or great feedback? Visit our Support Center to chat with us on the web orÂ in-app.Bitcoin is here. was originally published in Hana World on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

entry.title: Better browsing is here.

The update will roll out to iOS devicesÂ soon.Whatâ€™s new in the HanaÂ browser?Clean, clutter-free designâ€Šâ€”â€ŠEnjoy a sleek interface that puts you in control, maximizing the space available for web apps and reducing unnecessary visualÂ clutter.Bookmark and save your favoritesâ€Šâ€”â€ŠQuickly access your top webapplications with our new bookmarking feature. Save, organize, and return to the apps you love in just aÂ tap.Hanaâ€™s browser allows you to browse and interact with applications across multiple blockchain ecosystems, including:EVM chains: Avalanche, Ethereum, Arbitrum, andÂ moreCosmos: Injective, Archway, Neutron, andÂ moreStellarSuiICONHavahComing soon: SolanaÂ support!This update is all about giving you a better and more personalized browsing experience. entry.title: Use Hana on Stellar.
entry.content: The Hana Wallet team is excited to share the growing synergy between Hana Wallet and the Stellar blockchain. With a strong focus on usability and security, Hana Wallet is your gateway to managing Stellar blockchain assets acrossÂ devices!Manage Stellar Blockchain Assets with HanaÂ WalletHana Wallet enables users to send and receive a wide variety of assets on the Stellar blockchain. While we are actively working on automatic detection for all tokens, users can reach out to our Support Center if they want specific assets to be prioritized for detection.Ledger Cold Wallet CompatibilityOur integration with the Stellar blockchain includes full support for Ledger cold wallets. This ensures that users who prefer the additional security of cold storage can confidently manage their Stellar-based assets through HanaÂ Wallet.Access Soroban dApps through Hanaâ€™s In-AppÂ BrowserHana Wallet features an in-app browser that allows users to interact with decentralized applications (dApps) on the Soroban ecosystem. For developers, Hana Wallet is available as part of the official Stellar wallet kit, making it easy to enable compatibility for their dApps within Stellarâ€™s ecosystem. Connect to these Soroban applications with Hana WalletÂ today:Soroswapâ€Šâ€”â€ŠThe first DEX of the Soroban blockchainDeFindexâ€Šâ€”â€ŠDiversified DeFi strategiesStellar Carbonâ€Šâ€”â€ŠA simple way to make negative emissions contributionsBalancedâ€Šâ€”â€ŠComingÂ soonNew Routes for In-App XLMÂ SwapsUsers are currently able to swap into XLM directly within Hana Wallet, powered by ChangeNOW exchange. The equivalent decentralized feature is currently in the final stages of audits and will go live once the integration by Balanced is complete. Cross-chain DEX movement of assets within Hana Wallet is powered by Balanced.Highlights from Stellar Meridian inÂ LondonOur team recently attended the Stellar Meridian conference in London, where we connected with leading developers and ecosystem partners. The event showcased how Stellar is driving real-world blockchain-powered solutions, with inspiring projects already transforming lives across Latin America and Africa. Hana Wallet aligns with this vision by enabling users to easily move assets across chains while retaining full self-custody.Stellar Meridian opening keynote by Executive Director DenelleÂ DixonDownload Hana WalletÂ TodayHana Wallet is available for download on both desktop and mobile devices. Get it today on Chrome, Appleâ€™s App Store, or Google Play and start managing your Stellar blockchain assets.We are excited about our journey with Stellar and remain committed to delivering real solutions that empower users. Stay tuned for more updates as we continue toÂ build!Use Hana on Stellar. was originally published in Hana World on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.
